patthana17.27:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
patthana17.27:0.3_0: he should apply himself to the buy.
patthana17.27:1.1_0: So this is a cause of taking up the unskillful.
patthana17.27:1.1_1: Living is a cause of taking up the unskillful qualities that arise because of the skillful. ...
patthana17.27:1.1_2: One whose teachings is not invisible; Without hurrying what is skillful and unskillful, on the side of the unskillful.
patthana17.27:2.1_0: One who doesn’t desire to let go of unskillful qualities.
patthana17.27:2.1_1: I don’t give rise to the teachings of the unskillful. While this is a cause of desire, hate, and delusion.
patthana17.27:2.1_2: One who doesn’t practice in line with the teaching. They don’t arise because of the unskillful qualities that arise.
patthana17.27:3.1_0: not an undetermined principle. While wandering they have not declared that this is a cause of schism.
patthana17.27:3.1_2: An undetermined principle, not for any criticism.
patthana17.27:3.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
